title: Smurf account looking for Only Koreans or Girls to play with
body: main is plat2 and smurf is gold5

replies.body: Didn't you already make a post about this? Lol?
Im diamond and when I see this I went wtf mode. Koreans or grill only? WTF get a life. And smurfing is illegal so dont go around posting you dumb nut

> [{quoted}](name=I am Le LK,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=MXwEE66U,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-08-04T08:43:36.195+0000)

> Im diamond and when I see this I went wtf mode. Koreans or grill only? WTF get a life. And smurfing is illegal so dont go around posting you dumb nut

"Illegal" lol

>
> "Illegal" lol

lol? Cause for me, I dont have the time to play a level 1 -> 30 just to smurf, and Im pretty sure tons of ppl r in the same position.

So technically smurfing = borrowing account or boosting since its not yours. Ye i know there r ppl that have the time to actually play a level 1 -> 30 account just to smurrf, but come on, thats the minority lmao dont lie.

> 
> So technically smurfing = borrowing account or boosting since its not yours. Ye i know there r ppl that have the time to actually play a level 1 -> 30 account just to smurrf, but come on, thats the minority lmao dont lie.

How is smurfing borrowing an account or boosting? Its just getting a new account, youre not sharing it there for its "legal" as you would say

> [{quoted}](name=I am Le LK,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=MXwEE66U,comment-id=000400020000,timestamp=2016-08-04T09:48:04.942+0000)
>
> read below you imbecile.

Here is what I have taken away from your statement :
1: You have no idea what "technically" means, assuming you heard your parents say it or something. 
2: No, smurfing is not equal to borrowing or buying another player's account in any way.
3: No, the minority of players are the ones who break the rules.

Make a new thread if you want me to educate you further and stop cluttering this thirsty kid's thread with your boosted garbage.
